# Divider/Rounders

Erika Record Baking Equipment is proud to offer industry-leading
divider/rounder solutions for both retail and wholesale bakeries. This
includes our innovative removable knife head assembly system which allows for
processing of products with multiple weight ranges in one machine. For
bakeries making large quantities of the same product, we also offer more
automated solutions for improved production.

For more information, please call our bakery equipment sales office and
showroom at 800.682.8203 or **click here**.

Contact Us

## Manual Solutions

_Ideal for retail bakeries that only need to address dough portioning._

## Multi-Product Solutions

_Ideal for retail bakeries that are making multiple products. These models can
process multiple weight ranges in one machine, using our innovative removable
knife head assembly (KHA) system._

#### Erika Record | HDE

**Production:** Retail

A manual hand divider capable of equally portioning dough into 15 or 36
pieces.

Learn More

#### Erika Record | Semi RH

**Production:** Retail

Our entry level model, this semi-automatic divider/rounder is designed to
accurately portion and perfectly round dough each and every time.

Learn More

#### Erika Record | Easy

**Production:** Retail

The Easy makes pressing dough easier, with automated lowering of the knife
head assembly and pressing of the dough.

Learn More

#### Erika Record | Easy Plus

**Production:** Retail

The Easy Plus makes processing even easier, with automated lowering of the
knife head assembly, pressing, and dividing of the dough.

Learn More

## Automated Solutions

_Ideal for retail and emerging wholesale bakeries that are making large
quantities of the same products. These models feature streamlined operation
for improved production flow._

#### Erika Record | Full

**Production:** Retail & Wholesale

The Full features automated processing of dough via dual button operation;
with lowering of the knife head assembly, pressing, dividing, and rounding of
dough achieved within seconds.

Learn More

#### Erika Record | Full Classic

**Production:** Retail & Wholesale

The Full Classic features complete automation of the pressing, dividing, and
rounding process, achieved within second and requiring no user intervention.

Learn More

## Square & Rectangular Solutions

_For bakeries producing square or rectangular products, we also offer the
Quadro Series configuration._

#### Erika Record | Quadro Series

**Production:** Retail & Wholesale

The Quadro Series is available across our entire lineup and faciltates
production of both round and rectangular products such a ciabatta.

Learn More

Contact Us

#### Get To Know Us…

Erika Record Baking Equipment is the leading distributor of high quality
bakery equipment within North America.

#### We ❤️ Bakers

We pride ourselves on customer service, experience you can trust, and a
commitment to distribute the best equipment offerings within the baking
industry.

#### The Latest & Greatest

  * The Best Bakers Deserve the Best Depositors! 😍
  * Artisan Bread Solutions For Your Bakery! 🍞
  * For Us It’s Personal ❤️

#### BBB Accredited

Because we want you to have a worry free experience...

#### Call Us: 800.682.8203
